CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK( Name),0, 10)+ IF(ISBLANK( Organisation_Trading_Name__c ),0, 10)+ IF(LEN(Phone) = 0, 0,10) + IF(ISBLANK( Email__c ),0, 5)+ IF(ISBLANK( Website ),0, 10)+ IF(ISBLANK( BillingStreet & BillingCity& BillingState& BillingPostalCode ),0, 10)+ IF(ISBLANK( ShippingStreet & ShippingCity& ShippingState& ShippingPostalCode ),0, 10)+ IF(ISBLANK( ParentId ),0, 5)+ IF(ISBLANK( DUNS_Number__c), 0, 4)+ IF(ISBLANK( Growth_Rate__c ),0, 4)+ IF(ISBLANK( Target_Markets__c ),0, 4)+ IF(ISBLANK( Situation__c ),0, 4)+ IF(ISBLANK( Opportunity__c ),0, 4)+ IF(ISBLANK( ABN__c ),0, 10)
CustomField.label: Data Quality Score
